original_text: Jesus got out of the boat. Immediately, a man with a bad spirit in him came to him. This man lived outside, among some graves. He was very strong and nobody could hold him. People often put chains around his ankles to hold him. They wanted to keep him in a safe place. But he broke the chains that held him.
korean_text: 이는 여러 번 고랑과 쇠사슬에 매였어도 쇠사슬을 끊고 고랑을 깨뜨렸음이러라 그리하여 아무도 그를 제어할 힘이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: Jesus got out of the boat.
Immediately, a man with a bad spirit in him came to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 곧, 악한 영이 들린 한 사람이 예수님께 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: This man lived outside, among some graves.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람은 무덤들 사이에서 밖에서 살았습니다.

sentences.original_text: People often put chains around his ankles to hold him.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그를 붙잡기 위해 종종 그의 발목에 쇠사슬을 채웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: They wanted to keep him in a safe place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 안전한 곳에 두고 싶었습니다.

sentences.original_text: But he broke the chains that held him.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 자신을 묶은 쇠사슬을 부숴버렸습니다.
